headline: Assessing Dominion Energy (D) Valuation After Offshore Wind Project Faces 90 Day Federal Stop Work Order
summary: The U.S. Department of the Interior’s 90 day stop work order on the Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind Project has put Dominion Energy (D) in focus and raised fresh questions about regulatory risk around its clean energy plans. See our latest analysis for Dominion Energy. At a share price of $58.72, Dominion Energy’s recent moves, including the 90 day halt on the Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind Project and a requested South Carolina rate increase, come after a small 30 day share price gain...

headline: Did a 90-Day Federal Halt to Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind Just Shift Dominion Energy’s (D) Investment Narrative?
summary: In early January 2026, Dominion Energy disclosed that the US Department of the Interior issued a Director’s Order requiring a 90-day halt to development of its Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind Project, a flagship offshore wind initiative intended to support Virginia’s growing power needs. The pause introduces fresh regulatory uncertainty around a project Dominion calls critical for grid reliability, national security and job creation, raising questions about how central offshore wind remains...
